reviews.review_msg: prof. whatley completely reaffirmed my love of poetry, romantic poetry in particular. this man is an absolute genius at helping his students realize the deepest meanings in the most complex poems, and he's also a really kind, caring man. if you think he's pompous you're not paying attention.

Michelle is a high quality prof. She is helpful, engaging, and very sweet. Yes, her readings are heavy, but this is university english, not Lit12. And to the person who slagged her fashion sense: I think you need to straighten out your priorities, missy. ;-)
